description:
It`s time for the Winter Olympics!  Or at least, a bizarre version of it, where Fuyuki and Keroro compete to prove whether Earthings or aliens are more powerful.  Naturally, Kululu goes out of his way to sabotage them both and cackle maniacally...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro contre Artus : un combat sportif acharné / Kururu contre Anna : un combat explosif
Keroro tai Fuyuki Sports de Gekitou de Arimasu / Kururu tai Aki Shinryaku Robo de Bakutou de Arimasu
ケロロVS[たい]冬樹 スポーツで激闘 であります / クルルVS秋 侵略ロボで爆闘 であります
